core.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.cards.Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    Represents a standard playing card with a specific suit and rank. Provides methods to describe and compare cards.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Card.Rank
      Enumeration of the thirteen ranks in a standard deck of cards, each with its display value.
      static class  Card.Suit
      Enumeration of the four suits in a standard deck of cards, each with a human-readable name and a symbol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(Card.Suit suit, Card.Rank rank)
      Constructs a card with the specified suit and rank.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      Returns a readable description of the card combining its symbol and rank.
      Card.Rank getRank()
      Returns the rank of this card.
      int getRankValue(Card.Rank rank)
      Converts a Rank to its corresponding numeric value for comparison.
      Card.Suit getSuit()
      Returns the suit of this card.
      boolean isGreaterThan(Card other)
      Compares this card to another based on their rank values.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public String getDescription()

      • isGreaterThan

        public boolean isGreaterThan(Card other)
        Compares this card to another based on their rank values.
        Parameters:
        other - the card to compare against
        Returns:
        true if this card's rank is greater than the other card's rank

      • getRankValue

        public int getRankValue(Card.Rank rank)
        Converts a Rank to its corresponding numeric value for comparison.
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank to evaluate
        Returns:
        integer value of the rank (2 through 14)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the rank is unknown
